Top-3 Similar Questions: ul_131089: Fetching all Git repositories in the background
Top-3 Scripts:
ul_131089: savelog -n -c 400 ~/log/git-fetch.log
find ~/git -type d -execdir [ -d '{}/.git' ]  \; -print -prune |
    parallel --gnu --keep-order \
    "date; echo {}; cd {}; git fetch --all --verbose" \
    >> ~/log/git-fetch.log 2>&1
